name: Dex - Extra Outfits
detailed_description:
The Extra Outfits DLC offers three new outfits to be worn by Dex: the Samio Cyberwear, the Euroforce BattleRig and the Armagear InvisiSuit. Not only do they each give Dex a brand new look, they also provide unique gameplay abilities!

Samio Cyberwear

The outfit of choice for hackers and cyber-explorers. A one-of-a-kind prototype suit, its helmet delivers a steady flow of neurochemicals directly to the wearer’s brain, enhancing her cognitive faculties and ability to regain her Focus. No need to consume Neurostims anymore!

Euroforce BattleRig

This one’s for the fighters! The BattleRig is the latest advancement in warfare technology by EuroForce. Using newly-discovered intermetallic compounds to strengthen their titanium alloy, its reinforced arms allow the wearer to safely block incoming bullets.

Armagear InvisiSuit

The InvisiSuit was developed by Armagear in conjunction with EchoCorp to provide the ultimate stealth gear. By simply standing still for a few seconds, the wearer will merge with her surroundings and become virtually invisible — until she gets herself noticed, that is.

A new side-quest

Hidden within the bowels of Harbor Prime lies a machine capable of assembling those outfits for you, provided you find the appropriate blueprints for each of them first. You’ll have to be on the lookout for clues about their location, and face serious opposition before finally earning them!

short_description: Adds three new outfits for Dex: the Samio Cyberwear, the Euroforce BattleRig and the Armagear InvisiSuit. Each of them gives Dex a brand new look as well as new gameplay abilities.
supported_languages:
English*, Czech, French, German, Hungarian, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
最低配備:
  • 作業系統: Microsoft Windows XP (SP2 or newer) / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • 處理器: Intel Pentium/AMD, 2.0 GHz or faster
  • 記憶體: 1536 MB 記憶體
  • 顯示卡: NVIDIA® GeForce® 8800 / ATI™ Radeon™ 2600 or better
  • DirectX: 版本：9.0c
  • 儲存空間: 8 GB 可用空間
  • 音效卡: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • 備註: Keyboard and mouse or Windows compatible gamepad
pc_requirements.recommended:
建議配備:
  • 作業系統: Microsoft Windows 8.1 or newer
  • 處理器: Intel i5, 2.4 GHz
  • 記憶體: 4 GB 記憶體
  • 顯示卡: NVIDIA® GeForce® GT 650M / AMD™ Radeon™ HD 5770 or better
  • DirectX: 版本：9.0c
  • 儲存空間: 8 GB 可用空間
  • 音效卡: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • 備註: Keyboard and mouse or Windows compatible gamepad
